lore: Trajann Valoris’ warrior prowess approaches that of the Primarchs of old. With the Watcher’s Axe he can bisect the sarcophagus of a Chaos Helbrute in a single swing, or use its built-in bolt weapon – known as Eagle’s Scream – to cut down enemy infantry with salvoes of adamantine-tipped penetrator bolts.

otherAbilities.name: Captain-General:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the characteristics of models in that unit and/or to any roll or test made for models in that unit (excluding modifiers to saving throws ).

otherAbilities.name: Moment Shackle:
otherAbilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase

otherAbilities.name: , you can select one of the following to take effect until the end of the phase:
otherAbilities.description: This model’s Watcher’s Axe melee weapon has an Attacks characteristic of 12. This model has a 2+ invulnerable save . Models in this model’s unit have the Fights First ability.
